title: Cache warming CLI command
description: CLI command to precompute and warm cache: pokercoach cache warm --spots=preflop,srp_flop. Show progress, ETA, disk usage.

title: Real-time game state sync
description: WebSocket connection from vision module to coaching UI. Push game state updates: new cards, actions, pot changes. <500ms latency target.

title: Implement HandRepository CRUD
description: Create repository class for storing and retrieving hands. Methods: save_hand(), get_hands_by_session(), get_hands_by_player(), get_hands_by_spot().

title: Precompute common preflop spots
description: Generate and cache solver outputs for common preflop scenarios: RFI ranges by position, 3bet/4bet spots, squeeze spots. Store as JSON files.

title: Add Field() examples to all API Pydantic models
description:
Add Pydantic Field() with example and description to all API models for rich Swagger docs.

Update these models with poker-specific examples:

coach.py:
- CoachQuery.question: example='Should I 3bet AKo from SB vs BTN open?'
- CoachQuery.hand: example='AhKs'
- CoachQuery.board: example='Qh Jd Tc'
- CoachQuery.position: example='SB'
- GTOQuery/GTOResponse: same pattern

opponents.py:
- PlayerStats.vpip: example=24.5
- PlayerStats.pfr: example=18.2
- PlayerStats.player_type: example='TAG'
- PlayerStats.confidence: example='medium'

analysis.py:
- HandAnalysis.hero_hand: example='AsKs'
- HandAnalysis.board: example='Ah 7d 2c 9s Kh'
- SessionSummary fields with realistic examples

Files: src/pokercoach/web/routes/coach.py, src/pokercoach/web/routes/opponents.py, src/pokercoach/web/routes/analysis.py

title: Implement GameState.to_solver_format()
description: Convert GameState to TexasSolver CLI input format. Handle preflop/flop/turn/river, encode bet sizes relative to pot/BB.

title: Wire LLM query_gto tool to solver
description: Connect PokerCoach._query_gto() to actually call TexasSolverBridge.get_strategy(). Return real solver data instead of placeholder.

title: Epic: Real-time Coaching UI
description: Live coaching during play: decision advice, range display, EV comparison, exploit suggestions. Separate window UI.

title: Implement TexasSolver._parse_output()
description: Parse solver JSON output into Solution dataclass. Extract strategies per hand, EVs, convergence metrics.
close_reason: Implemented _parse_output() to parse solver JSON, extract strategies, EVs, convergence metrics. All 9 tests pass.

title: Epic: Opponent Profiling & Exploitation
description: Track opponent stats (HUD + full DB), identify player types, suggest exploitative adjustments. Data from hand history import + live vision capture.

title: Generate exploit recommendations
description: Based on player type + specific leaks, suggest adjustments: 3bet wider vs FISH, tighten vs NIT, etc. Integrate with solver for EV delta.

title: Implement EV comparison chart
description: Bar chart comparing EV of available actions (fold/call/raise). Show GTO frequency vs recommended exploit adjustment.
acceptance_criteria: ls frontend/src/components/EVChart.tsx && npm run --prefix frontend test -- --testPathPattern=EVChart
close_reason: EVChart.tsx component created with EV bar chart, GTO vs exploit frequency comparison, best action summary. File exists at frontend/src/components/EVChart.tsx

title: Implement TexasSolver._build_command()
description: Build CLI command array from GameState. Map positions, encode board, pot, stacks, bet sizing trees.

title: Design coaching window layout
description: Design separate window UI layout: decision panel (action + freq), range display area, EV comparison chart, exploit suggestions section. Use React + FastAPI websocket.
close_reason: CoachingWindow.tsx created with decision panel, range display, EV chart, exploit suggestions. All web route tests pass.

title: Implement StatsCalculator
description: Calculate HUD stats from hand history. Update running aggregates as new hands added. Support sample size thresholds for stat reliability.
close_reason: StatsCalculator implemented with process_hand(), running aggregates, VPIP/PFR/WTSD/WSD tracking. Test passes.

title: Implement range visualization component
description: React component to display 13x13 range grid. Color-code by action frequency. Show hero range + estimated villain range side-by-side.
acceptance_criteria: ls frontend/src/components/RangeGrid.tsx && npm run --prefix frontend test -- --testPathPattern=RangeGrid
close_reason: RangeGrid.tsx component created with 13x13 grid, color-coding by action frequency, hero/villain side-by-side comparison. File exists at frontend/src/components/RangeGrid.tsx

title: Dynamic solver fallback
description: When cache misses, run solver on-the-fly with timeout. Queue result for cache storage. Show loading state to user.

title: Wire PokerCoach LLM to /api/coach endpoints
description:
Wire the PokerCoach LLM class to the FastAPI routes.

Implementation:
1. In app.py startup event, create global coach instance:
   - Read ANTHROPIC_API_KEY from os.environ (required)
   - Read TEXASSOLVER_PATH from os.environ (optional, use cache if not set)
   - Create PrecomputedSolver with cache dir and optional fallback solver
   - Create PokerCoach(CoachConfig(api_key=key), solver)
   - Store in app.state.coach

2. In routes/coach.py:
   - Get coach from request.app.state.coach
   - /api/coach/ask: Build GameState from query params, call coach.ask(question, game_state), return real response
   - /api/coach/gto: Build GameState, call solver.get_strategy(game_state, hand), format as GTOResponse

Files: src/pokercoach/web/app.py, src/pokercoach/web/routes/coach.py
acceptance_criteria: ANTHROPIC_API_KEY=test uv run pytest tests/unit/test_web_routes.py -v -k coach

title: Auto-capture hands from vision module
description: Hook into vision pipeline to automatically store each detected hand. Track session start/end, running stats.

title: Integrate solver + opponent data for live advice
description: Combine GTO solver output with opponent profile to generate live recommendations. Show what changes due to opponent tendencies.

title: Define opponent stats schema
description: Design PlayerStats model: VPIP, PFR, 3bet%, AF, WTSD, W$SD, positional stats, bet sizing patterns. Store per-player aggregates + per-hand raw data.

title: Live opponent tracking from vision
description: Hook vision module to update opponent stats in real-time. Track actions per hand, update aggregates after showdown/fold.

title: Decision history timeline
description: Show scrollable timeline of past decisions this session. Click to review hand with solver analysis. Flag potential mistakes.

title: Wire CLI ask and analyze commands to real implementations
description:
Wire the CLI ask and analyze commands to use real implementations instead of stubs.

ask command:
1. Read ANTHROPIC_API_KEY from environment
2. Read TEXASSOLVER_PATH from environment (optional)
3. Create PrecomputedSolver with cache fallback
4. Create PokerCoach instance
5. Build GameState from --hand, --board, --position, --pot, --stack options
6. Call coach.ask(question, game_state)
7. Print formatted response with rich

analyze command:
1. Detect format from --format flag or filename
2. Create appropriate parser (PokerStarsParser)
3. Create HandHistoryImporter with parser
4. Call importer.import_from_file(path)
5. Print summary: hands imported, errors, stats

Files: src/pokercoach/cli.py

title: Build TexasSolver from source
description: Clone TexasSolver repo, build with cmake, install binary to bin/texas_solver. Create scripts/build_solver.sh for reproducibility.

title: Hand history import from files
description: Import hand histories from PokerStars/GGPoker text files into storage. Use existing parser module.

title: Precompute common postflop spots
description: Cache common postflop lines: SRP IP/OOP cbet spots, 3bet pots, common board textures. Focus on flop spots (most queried).
close_reason: Postflop cache files already exist with 40 JSON files covering common board textures (dry high/mid/low, wet broadway/connected/two-tone, monotone high/mid, paired high/low) for both IP/OOP positions in SRP and 3bet pots. Acceptance criteria verified: ls -la cache/postflop/*.json | wc -l returns 40 files.

title: Implement PlayerTypeClassifier
description: Classify players: NIT, TAG, LAG, FISH, MANIAC based on stat thresholds. Return confidence score based on sample size.

title: Add complete setup and usage documentation to README
description:
Update README.md with comprehensive setup and usage documentation.

Add/update sections:

## Prerequisites
- Python 3.11+ (uv recommended)
- Anthropic API key (required for LLM coach)
- TexasSolver binary (optional - precomputed cache works without it)

## TexasSolver Installation (macOS)
brew install cmake
git clone https://github.com/bupticybee/TexasSolver.git
cd TexasSolver && mkdir build && cd build
cmake .. && make -j4

## Environment Setup
export ANTHROPIC_API_KEY='sk-ant-...'
export TEXASSOLVER_PATH='/path/to/TexasSolver'  # optional

## Usage - API
- Start server: uv run uvicorn pokercoach.web.app:app --reload
- Swagger docs: http://localhost:8000/docs
- Example curl with real poker input/output

## Usage - CLI
- pokercoach ask 'question' --hand AhKs --position BTN
- pokercoach analyze hand_history.txt
- pokercoach cache warm

## Usage - Python Library
- from pokercoach.llm.coach import PokerCoach
- Complete working example

Files: README.md
acceptance_criteria: grep -q 'ANTHROPIC_API_KEY' README.md && grep -q 'TexasSolver' README.md && grep -q 'pokercoach ask' README.md

title: Implement PrecomputedSolver._cache_key()
description: Normalize game states for cache lookup. Canonicalize: effective stacks (100bb buckets), pot as % of stack, suit isomorphism, relative position (IP/OOP).

title: Design hand storage schema
description: Design SQLAlchemy models for storing poker hands: session, players, actions, board runouts, hero holdings. Support querying by player, position, hand type.

title: E2E solver integration test
description: End-to-end test: GameState -> solver -> Strategy. Verify full pipeline works with real solver binary.
